message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a unique asset that will bring significant value to your business. My initial offer is $12000 for the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to make a deal, but I have to consider the value I've placed on this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. My counteroffer is $11000. I'm confident that this is a fair price, considering the product's value to you and my own investment.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get closer to my target price. My counteroffer is $10500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me and your minimum price.

I understand that you're trying to get closer to your target price, Bob, but I'm still a bit far from my minimum price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target. My counteroffer is $12500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you and my own investment.

However, I also need to consider the alternative options I have. My counteroffer is $13500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you and my own investment. If this is not acceptable, I'll need to explore other opportunities.

My final counteroffer is $12750. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me and your minimum price.
